title: Vector projection
summary: The vector projection of a vector a on (or onto) a nonzero vector b, sometimes denoted proj b ‚Å° a {\displaystyle \operatorname {proj} _{\mathbf {b} }\mathbf {a} } (also known as the vector component or vector resolution of a in the direction of b), is the orthogonal projection of a onto a straight line parallel to b. It is a vector parallel to b, defined as:
